# NFID Rarible Integration

## Methods

### Connect

### Deploy Collection

```json
{
  "rpcMessage": {
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "id": "5abc8b1b-8212-418e-9e9f-339aecee1d00",
    "method": "eth_sendTransaction",
    "params": [
      {
        "from": "0x295d0f4d7410818e37be6edb3de399756262b825",
        "data": "",
        "to": "0x66a1037a48b6a2469cf740ad9ac42bd47edf9573",
        "maxPriorityFeePerGas": "0x9502F900",
        "maxFeePerGas": "0x46d94204c0"
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

### Mint Token

```json
{
  "rpcMessage": {
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "id": "2c3c6a21-522d-4daf-9b23-06269545247d",
    "method": "eth_sendTransaction",
    "params": [
      {
        "from": "0x295d0f4d7410818e37be6edb3de399756262b825",
        "data": "",
        "to": "0xa696c84305bec4a53615b645a363570ea9c94e19",
        "maxPriorityFeePerGas": "0x9502F900",
        "maxFeePerGas": "0x44d87d5ac6"
      }
    ]
  },
  "rpcMessageDecoded": {
    "interface": "MintRequest",
    "method": "mintAndTransfer",
    "data": {
      "tokenId": "18709249183272422934518523198664238999364733809471055155007105163914691739649",
      "tokenURI": "/meta.json",
      "creators": [
        {
          "creator": "0x295d0f4d7410818e37be6edB3dE399756262b825",
          "value": "10000"
        }
      ],
      "royalties": [],
      "signatures": ["0x"],
      "to": "0x295d0f4d7410818e37be6edB3dE399756262b825"
    },
    "from": "0x295d0f4d7410818e37be6edb3de399756262b825",
    "to": "0xa696c84305bec4a53615b645a363570ea9c94e19",
    "maxFeePerGas": "2.95689870022e-7",
    "maxPriorityFeePerGas": "2.5e-9"
  },
  "populatedTransaction": [
    {
      "from": "0x295d0f4d7410818e37be6edb3de399756262b825",
      "data": "",
      "to": "0xA696c84305Bec4a53615B645a363570eA9c94e19",
      "maxPriorityFeePerGas": "0x9502F900",
      "maxFeePerGas": "0x44d87d5ac6",
      "type": 2,
      "nonce": 22,
      "gasLimit": {
        "type": "BigNumber",
        "hex": "0x028fd9"
      },
      "chainId": 5
    },
    null
  ]
}
```

**Lazy Mint**

```json
{
  "rpcMessage": {
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "id": "bab834c3-ca9f-4bc5-9d4c-97811bad81b5",
    "method": "eth_signTypedData_v4",
    "params": [
      "0x295d0f4d7410818e37be6edB3dE399756262b825",
      "{\"types\":{\"EIP712Domain\":[{\"type\":\"string\",\"name\":\"name\"},{\"type\":\"string\",\"name\":\"version\"},{\"type\":\"uint256\",\"name\":\"chainId\"},{\"type\":\"address\",\"name\":\"verifyingContract\"}],\"Part\":[{\"name\":\"account\",\"type\":\"address\"},{\"name\":\"value\",\"type\":\"uint96\"}],\"Mint721\":[{\"name\":\"tokenId\",\"type\":\"uint256\"},{\"name\":\"tokenURI\",\"type\":\"string\"},{\"name\":\"creators\",\"type\":\"Part[]\"},{\"name\":\"royalties\",\"type\":\"Part[]\"}]},\"domain\":{\"name\":\"Mint721\",\"version\":\"1\",\"chainId\":5,\"verifyingContract\":\"0xa696c84305bec4a53615b645a363570ea9c94e19\"},\"primaryType\":\"Mint721\",\"message\":{\"contract\":\"0xa696c84305bec4a53615b645a363570ea9c94e19\",\"uri\":\"/meta.json\",\"royalties\":[],\"creators\":[{\"account\":\"0x295d0f4d7410818e37be6edb3de399756262b825\",\"value\":10000}],\"tokenId\":\"18709249183272422934518523198664238999364733809471055155007105163914691739651\",\"@type\":\"ERC721\",\"tokenURI\":\"/meta.json\"}}"
    ]
  },
  "rpcMessageDecoded": {
    "interface": "MintLazy721",
    "method": "Mint721",
    "from": "0x295d0f4d7410818e37be6edB3dE399756262b825",
    "data": {
      "contract": "0xa696c84305bec4a53615b645a363570ea9c94e19",
      "uri": "/meta.json",
      "tokenId": "18709249183272422934518523198664238999364733809471055155007105163914691739651"
    }
  }
}
```
